articles.title: Yemen rebels seize UAE ship; hackers hit Israeli newspaper - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Yemen’s Houthi rebels seized a ship in the Red Sea, armed drones targeted Baghdad's international airport, and hackers hit a major Israeli newspaper Monday — a string of assaults that showed the reach of Iran-allied militias on the anniversary of America’s ki…

articles.title: Oops! Harry Potter reunion show uses photo of Emma Roberts instead of Emma Watson - CNA
articles.description: The HBO special's small hiccup featured a childhood photo of the American Horror Story actress instead of Hermione Granger herself.
articles.content: Mistaken identity aside, the HBO Max special offered a few revelations regarding the 31-year-old Watson, including how she almost quit her role and having a huge crush on co-star Tom Felton, who play… [+448 chars]

articles.title: Duel Sengit Chelsea-Liverpool Bisa Muluskan Jalan Man City Juara Liga Primer - Goal.com
articles.description: One of the most promising prospects in American soccer just landed a $20 million transfer deal to the Bundesliga. Here's what makes Pepi and his rise so special.
